subtitleNullable: Detecting plant diseases early boosts crop yields
descriptionNullable: The Plant Diseases dataset was created by a group of researchers at the Indian Institute of Technology and was initially described in a research [paper.](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1911.10317.pdf) One of the authors, Pratik Kayal, has shared the dataset on [GitHub](https://github.com/pratikkayal/PlantDoc-Dataset), where it is available for public use. The PlantDoc dataset consists of a total of 2,569 images of 13 different plant species. The dataset is organized into 30 different classes, with labels indicating whether each image is healthy or diseased. There are a total of 8,851 labeled objects within the dataset, making it a valuable resource for image classification and object detection tasks.
title: Plant Diseases Detection Dataset
subtitle: Detecting plant diseases early boosts crop yields
description: The Plant Diseases dataset was created by a group of researchers at the Indian Institute of Technology and was initially described in a research [paper.](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1911.10317.pdf) One of the authors, Pratik Kayal, has shared the dataset on [GitHub](https://github.com/pratikkayal/PlantDoc-Dataset), where it is available for public use. The PlantDoc dataset consists of a total of 2,569 images of 13 different plant species. The dataset is organized into 30 different classes, with labels indicating whether each image is healthy or diseased. There are a total of 8,851 labeled objects within the dataset, making it a valuable resource for image classification and object detection tasks.
